definition: A gathering of individuals for the purpose of exchanging ideas, discussing topics, making decisions, or coordinating activities. It typically involves the participation of multiple people who come together at a specific time and place to engage in productive conversations or collaborative work. Meetings are commonly used in professional, educational, or organizational settings to facilitate communication, planning, problem-solving, or decision-making processes.

examples.german: Wir haben ein wichtiges Meeting morgen.
examples.english: We have an important meeting tomorrow.
I have to go to the meeting.
